titleStmt.title: Great news from Lymerick. An account of the late action of Capt. Cole, in the River Shannon. : Being [a] relation of his taking a French frigate; as also, of his barring up thirty sale more of French ships. : With an account of the famous Baldarick Lord O'Donnel's terms of submission to their Majesties, for himself, and followers. : To which is added, the late defeat of the rebels in the north, by Collonel Ramsey.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N. Kettlewel, by St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
